question.string: what is the number of countries per continent?

query.sparql: prefix mon: <http://www.semwebtech.org/mondial/10/meta#> prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> select ?continent (count(?country) as ?amount_countries) { ?country rdf:type mon:Country . ?country mon:encompassed ?continent } group by ?continent

question.string: what is the number of rivers per country?

query.sparql: prefix mon: <http://www.semwebtech.org/mondial/10/meta#> prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> select ?country ?name (count(?river) as ?amount_rivers) { ?river rdf:type mon:River . ?river mon:locatedIn ?country . ?country rdf:type mon:Country . ?country mon:name ?name } group by ?country ?nameorder by desc(?amount_rivers)
